name: Thanks, game! (fixed up)
description:
This version of the game is the same as the Jam version, only I fixed a bug.

The bug was that on some computers the jump was too low, technically it's fixed now.

If not, please write it in the comments, thanks.

Jam Game: https://itch.io/jam/funni-jam/rate/1509836?before=3#post-5817506
